with pytest.raises(ValueError, match=
    'Different length of the given parameters found.*'):
    mr3 = MatrixRepository(labels=y[label_ind], indexes=label_ind, examples
        =X[label_ind[0:3]])
with pytest.raises(Exception, match=
    'This repository has the instance information.*'):
    mr2.update_query(labels=[1], indexes=[9])
with pytest.warns(ValidityWarning, match='.*is not in the repository.*'):
    mr2.discard(index=7)
with pytest.raises(ValueError, match='Different length of parameters found.*'):
    mr2.update_query(labels=[1], indexes=[10, 9])
with pytest.warns(ValidityWarning, match='.*is not in the repository.*'):
    mr2.retrieve_by_indexes(indexes=7)
with pytest.warns(ValidityWarning, match=
    '.*or retrieving is not in the repository.*'):
    mr2.retrieve_by_examples(examples=[4, 4])
